scripts.start-local: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/local.ts
scripts.package-win: npm run build && npm run copy-files-win && cd dist && zip -r ../google-lambda.zip .
scripts.copy-files-win: xcopy .\package.json dist\ /Y && xcopy .\package-lock.json dist\ /Y && xcopy .\node_modules dist\node_modules /E /I /Y
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy-files && cd dist && zip -r ../google-lambda.zip .
